title: tower street apartments

label.title: perfect for 9-night stay
label.text: Located in Destin, a 3-minute walk from Miramar Beach and 2.4 km from James Lee Park Public Beach

descriptionTitle: stay in the heart of Krakow
description: Located in Destin, a 3-minute walk from Miramar Beach and 2.4 km from James Lee Park Public Beach, 10 H Two Bedroom Condo provides air-conditioned accommodations with a balcony and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment can use the patio.</br>The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and oven, and a bathroom. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.</br>Fort Walton Beach Park is 20.9 km from the apartment, while Big Kahuna's Water Park is 10.8 km away. The nearest airport is Destin Executive Airport,10 km from 10 H Two Bedroom Condo.
